tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (PP (IN from) (S (VP (VBG being) (ADJP (NN stranger) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (NN friend)) (CC and) (NP (RB now))))) (PP (IN from) (S (VP (VBG being) (NP (NP (NN friend)) (PP (TO to) (NP (NN STRANGER)))) (PP (IN !!)))))))))
